description.value:
Frequency once per day

Effect Void energy seeps out of you, decaying everything within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] and causing plants and foliage to age and decompose. Natural difficult terrain is destroyed, and creatures in the area with the plant or wood trait take @Damage[1d6[void]] damage with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.
